entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
